resources.string: Activate module for Android Framework and also SystemUI
Keep splitscreen on when pressing home key.
Show or hide the Split Screen Divider
Space between the two applications in split view (use 0 for default).
Dividers inset position relative to the divider width.
The rate by which the Screen should be Split
If checked the smaller screen will be on Right instead of Left
Launch the Music and Navigation application automatically in splitscreen.
Music application to launch in Split Screen on Left.
Navigation application to launch in Split Screen on Right/Left
Videos application to launch in Split Screen on Right
DPI for the Mini Desktop Launcher.
Used to launch applications in split screen
You can use this to automatically launch defined applications in split screen on boot. Please define the apps in the settings for this to work.

* Only needed if you want to launch applications in split screen mode automatically. If you use FYTStarter you can activate service there otherwise please give root access to this app so it can active the service automatially by itself.
Activating service requires root. Please grant access.
Application not found. Please set Music, Navigation and Videos applications correctly in settings.
